definitions.definition: The act of aggravating , or making worse; used of evils, natural or moral; the act of increasing in severity or heinousness ; something additional to a crime or wrong and enhancing its guilt or injurious consequences.
An extrinsic circumstance or accident which increases the guilt of a crime or the misery of a calamity.

main_definition: The act of aggravating , or making worse; used of evils, natural or moral; the act of increasing in severity or heinousness ; something additional to a crime or wrong and enhancing its guilt or injurious consequences.
secondary_definitions: An extrinsic circumstance or accident which increases the guilt of a crime or the misery of a calamity.
